Package javelin.controller.fight.setup

Class BattleSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.fight.setup.BattleSetup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArenaSetup, LocationFightSetup
    public class BattleSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a Map, a Squad and a Fight setups an initial battle state.

    • Field Summary

      static int pass
      Exposes which placement pass the last setup ended on.

      • place

        protected void place​(boolean strict)
              throws GaveUp
        Sets each Combatant in a sensible starting location.
        Parameters:
        strict - If false will relax some of the placement constraints.
        Throws:
        GaveUp - If exceeded maximum allowed attempts.
